Principle of the Razor.name: Principle of the Razor
Principle of the Razor.flavor: You know where to place your blades to cause the most pain.
Principle of the Razor.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade and use it to attack with this power.
Principle of the Razor.onHit: 2[W] + ability modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. If the target is already dazed, you deal 2d6 extra damage instead.

Dance of the Whirling Razors.name: Dance of the Whirling Razors
Dance of the Whirling Razors.flavor: You run at your opponent, leaping at the last moment, then spin through the air and carve a bloody path through your enemies.
Dance of the Whirling Razors.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade and use it to attack with this power.
Dance of the Whirling Razors.effect: Before the attack, you shift your speed.
Dance of the Whirling Razors.onHit: 2[W] + ability modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage and is dazed (save ends both).
Dance of the Whirling Razors.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Arena Dancer.name: Arena Dancer
Arena Dancer.flavor: Sinuous movements and practiced steps make it hard for your enemies to pin you down.
Arena Dancer.effect: You assume the stance of the arena dancer. Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex. Also, whenever an enemy misses you with a melee attack, you can shift 1 square as a free action and gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.
